title: (x) Mercedes Benz campaign font - Corporate A {Tiff}
content:
I'm stumped. Anybody have an idea which font this is?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [mercedes\_font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114142802/http:/typophile.com/files/mercedes_font.jpg) | 9.93 KB |
author: brianj1400

comments.content: btw. the type is squeezed 80% for the ads
Much thanks Tiffany and Nike. Nothing beats a timely and precise answer! Cheers.

_btw. the type is squeezed 80% for the ads_

don't you mean [squooshed](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114142802/http:/typophile.com/wiki/squooshed)™?
Paul, are you responsible for this TypoWiki entry? Brilliant job, mate! LOL :-D
i think it could use a bit more elaboration. miss tiff may want to edit it herself once she finds it.
squooshing type is hella-mean and hella-wrong

Awesome! I just Googled "Mercedes-Benz font" and this came up first. The printing company I'm interning at needed to know because there are so many fonts in our Suitcase, we didn't know which group to activate.

Oh god! Tifff! Please don't sue me! I have used the word squooshed many times without paying your royalty! I didn't even read the EULA, which you tatooed on my forehead--(tough to read backwards in a mirror :-P

ChrisL
